entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CallSiteValidator doesn't cache results of the walk #96253
  • Numerous GlobalizationNative P/Invokes in System.Private.CoreLib.dll don't have a corresponding native function anymore #96251
  • `ConcurrentDictionary.TryGetValue` faster than `Dictionary.TryGetValue` #96250
  • Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Tasks generating consolidation notice when trimming enabled #96249
  • Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x8007000C #96247
  • NaN arithmetic is not consistent with the IEEE 754 standard. #96246
  • Reduced .NET8 R2R performance #96242
  • Blazor WASM Custom debug configs need <DebuggerSupport Condition="''$(Configuration)' == 'DebugCustom'">true</DebuggerSupport> #96239
  • Thread calling CancellationTokenSource.Cancel() continues with another task and after that released task by this thread is never run. #96238
  • UDP Socket.ReceiveFrom with receive timeout and SocketAddress shows inconsistent behavior between Windows and Linux #96237
  • [DataTable] Decimal Column Bug, within parallel #96234

Closed

  • Trim analyzer: Doesn't produce warnings due to annotated generic parameter in various situations #95121
  • Consider changing BBJ_CALLFINALLY/BBJ_ALWAYS representation of call to finally #95355
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: How to get already mapped members when deserializing? #96233
  • Swift into .NET using `CallConvSwift` and `UnmanagedCallersOnly` calling convention #96059
    9.0.0
  • Add a String reverse method #95110
  • Support Tar with large entry size #96209

PullRequests

Created

  • KeyedCollection debug view doesn't work #96261
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add option to disable log message queue behavior (performance issue) #96260
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Intrinsify Interlocked.And and Interlocked.Or on XARCH #96258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create a Codespace for Android development #96257
    area-Meta, os-android
  • [IGNORE] Disable partial sharing on wasm. #96255
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • CallSiteValidator doesn't cache results of the walk #96254
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96248
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wip] [mono] Enable some of the disabled JIT/Directed/callconv/ runtime tests #96243
    needs-area-label
  • Fix missing return in Microsoft.Bcl.TimeProvider's Task.WaitAsync #96240
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • [mono][aot] Allow valuetype sharing in wrappers for valuetypes with an explicit l… #96230
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [LoongArch64] change the branch's disasm-format. #96229
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove null check in BasicBlock::SetNext and SetPrev #96228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [ILLink analyzer] Move generic parameter analysis to dataflow #95482
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix crash when processing aliases that do not point at names #96048
    area-System.Text.Json, source-generator
  • Various no-diff cleanups and debugging additions/fixes #96200
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve some BasicBlock asserts #96231
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce use of madvise DODUMP/DONTDUMP #95643
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Console.Unix: fix ANSI colors over redirected standard output. #95654
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix ProcessWaitingTests.WaitChain and ProcessWaitingTests.Wa… #96187
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, test-enhancement, community-contribution, arch-riscv, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Simplify codegen for div/mod #96068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Updated

  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Add crossgen2 for riscv64 #95188
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).IsPrimitive #96226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix `CopyStringDictionary` #96093
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • Add runtime module address to SpecialDiagInfo block in createdump and fix missing DotNetRuntimeDebugHeader export #96121
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #93043
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add LoongArch64's SIMD128/256 instructions within emitter. #95456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • New exception handling diagnostic fixes #96065
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Allow preinitializing `AppContext.TryGetSwitch` #95948
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement more APIs in new TypeBuilder, fix bugs found during testing #95753
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Replaced string concatenation by StringBuilder usage #95760
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64: Add IF_SVE_DT_3A, IF_SVE_DU_3A, IF_SVE_DX_3A, IF_SVE_DY_3A #96201
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [wasm] Enable more MT PLinq areas #96215
    area-System.Linq.Parallel
  • [NativeAOT] Support library mode with NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #93658
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix potential 'Floating Point Exception' with speculative execution #93517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip after AOT compilation for library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add Arm64 encodings for SVE IF_SVE_CQ_4A_A & IF_SVE_GE_4A group #96214
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Precise reflection-visible delegate target analysis #96166
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix bug in label printing in disasm #96136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Wasm components as replacement for lower level, e.g. libc implementations. Such as HTTP/time/random #2468
  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Support dotnet.js #2434

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump the roslyn commit to a version supporting top-level async2 functions. Add a test. #2470

Updated

  • Benchmark of interaction between async1 and async2 #2469

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Many warnings "has a resource with the locale 'de'. This locale is not recognized by .NET" #37636

Closed

  • Using PublishAot results in a nuget package not found error #37639
  • Missing `Microsoft.Common.Test.targets` #37637

PullRequests

Merged

  • Base version #37625
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Swap 9.0 to current target framework #37609
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • More user-friendly Compile-time type checking / 更加人性化的编译时类型检查 #7778

Updated

  • Extension lowering #7771
  • [Proposal]: Lock statement pattern #7104
    Working Set
  • [Proposal] Functional Interfaces #3452

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add proposal for BinaryCompatOnlyAttribute #7707

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Running Test.cmd causes lots of unit tests to fail #71386
  • Fix file-name to ID-mapping code in solution. #71384
  • CallerArgumentExpression does not capture null-forgiving operator #71390
  • Delegate creation can result in a delegate violating semantics of an `in` parameter. #71383
  • Partially closed generic type name is not parsed correctly when first type argument is missing #71379
  • `()` is not parsed as empty tuple type in type argument list of method call #71378
  • Abstract static members are not supported by runtime binder, but no error is reported at compile time #71375

Closed

  • Offer 'use collection expressions' even in locations that change semantics #70996
    Backlog
  • In c# code cleanup, How to stop visual studio 2022 adding comments /* Unmerged change from project 'xxxx (net6.0)' #71381
  • `foreach` should support types with multiple `IEnumerable<T>` implementations if there is one implementation all can be converted to #71387
  • IDE0005 codefix could remove empty pragma #71382
  • VSTHRD004 is misreported #71377
  • MSBuildWorkspace fails to load legal project, leading to downstream symbol resolution issues. #50112
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions: use iteration type for convertibility of element types #71397
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Break Solution-checksums into a checksums for pure-state vs source-generator state #71396
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Call GetURI when getting a URI for a document #71395
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Features core tests #71394
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove unused enum values #71393
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove WPF dependencies from Workspace and Features test layers #71392
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: OOP calls with different snapshots. #71391
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • PR feedback and cleanup after solution-state/compilation-state refactoring. #71389
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use IHotReloadLogger service to log message whenever EnC is disabled #71385
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Unit test layering #71376
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Offer use-collection-expr when targeting interfaces #71373
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Extract compilation-tracker/SG-production code out of SolutionState to a new owner. #71257
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #68771
    Area-IDE
  • Use CPS for tests where saving documents needs to be reliable #70983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Inline Rename] Update the UI related to Copilot #71332
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize singleton list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #71147
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Support code folding for argument lists #71064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Only apply one document info change for linked documents #71220
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add handling of params collections for natural delegate types #71334
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and… #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use runtime helper `CreateSpan` for `stackalloc` of non-byte arrays #71261
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Run and fix #52953
  • GRPC Server causing Microsoft.AspNetCore.Connections.ConnectionResetException when listening to IPAddress.Any #52952
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #52951
  • Perf improvement: mvc #52950
  • Blazor Web project with Auth does not correctly configure Logout service #52948
  • Hot reload .cshtml not working in IIS #52946
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #52941
  • HttpContext.AuthenticateAsync do not return "sub" claim after update to .NET 8 #52940
  • UserManager.IsInRoleAsync(user, "rolename") still shows user in role after deleting role. #52939
  • property delcared with [TempData] does not work together with RedirectToPage if it contains date value #52938

Closed

  • Proposal for UI-Driven Type Refactoring Tool Using Tag #52922
  • Call JS checkValidity() from Blazor EditForm - Get ElementReference for EditForm #52902
  • Blazor WASM deployment to AWS S3 was working now failing with "Failed to find a valid digest in the 'integrity' attribute for resource" #52942
  • Tool for tracking changes by Blazor #49867
    Backlog
  • Simpler empty Blazor templates #43265
  • Can't debug Blazor app in Teams #30898
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor Webassembly Client debug not working when running on Local Service Fabric cluster #28649
    Planning: WebUI
  • IIS Express server for hosted Blazor app fails to launch with custom environment variable #30422
    Planning: WebUI
  • Better error log for: "No .NET call dispatcher has been set." #48164
    Planning: WebUI
  • Component with incorrect parameter name emits no warning / error #45667
    Planning: WebUI
  • Better error message when SignalR message size limit exceeded #32360
    Planning: WebUI
  • When specifying non-existing event for data binding to bind to, unhandled exception is thrown #28804
    Planning: WebUI
  • Add a modal \ overlay component #23319
    Planning: WebUI
  • Make it easier to debug System.ArgumentException: There is no tracked object with id 'xx'. Perhaps the DotNetObjectReference instance was already disposed #30878
    Planning: WebUI
  • Application.DispatcherUnhandledException alternative in Blazor #43454
    Planning: WebUI
  • Allow more oidc-client options to be set in OidcProviderOptions for Blazor wasm authentication. #36028
    Planning: WebUI
  • [Blazor WASM] Expose NotifyAuthenticationStateChanged on the AuthenticationStateProvider #21669
    Planning: WebUI
  • [Blazor] Nested Components with inner partial classes (not child components) #20765
    Planning: WebUI
  • Build Error in Azure Pipeline when Building Blazor Project with MSBuild in Blazor WebAssembly Mode #52898
  • Blazor AOT Publish For Webassembly Hosted Application NET8.0 #52905
  • Support for Blazor Events in Blazor SSR. #52919
  • InteractiveServer with prerender incorrectly waits for the completion of OnInitializedAsync #52926
  • Post request does not render end state of components on SSR page #52871
    8.0.x
  • Incorrect child component content is rendered with static SSR or prerendering on server #52131
    8.0.x
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #52773
  • Support AsyncPageable for Blazor ItemsProviderRequest #52282
  • QuickGrid in Blazor Server .Net 8 Not available #52463
  • blazor WebAssembly does not run normally #52721

PullRequests

Created

  • Force Logout API to get SignInManager from services #52949
    area-mvc
  • [release/8.0] Fix SSR page rendering intermediate state instead of the end state of components #52943
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Fix SSR page rendering intermediate state instead of the end state of components #52823
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • Un-quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETests.ServerRenderingTests.InteractivityTest.AutoRenderMode_UsesBlazorServerOnFirstLoad_ThenWebAssemblyOnSuccessiveLoads` #51887
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [Infrastructure] Move back to NPM #52914
    area-infrastructure
  • Add explicit null checks on ObjectPool.Return rather than triggering random failures later on #52935
    area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Fix NavigationManager.Refresh() on SSR-only pages #52767
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix Blazor enhanced form bugs #52765
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • In this Frame, errors can occur if the Image's WidthRequest attribute value is less than 160. Cause that 'hot reload' is very fragile. #19543
    Backlog
  • MAUI WinUI Grids don't render properly in flyout menu #19542
    Backlog
  • [iOS] - Swipeview with collectionview issue #19541
    Backlog
  • Nuget connectivity/ Android Device manager connectivity #19537
  • Getting AccessViolationException while adding custom resource dictionary in App.Xaml file #19535

Closed

  • Problem in MAUI GraphicsView, DRagInteraction Stops when Pointer is not moved. #19270
  • Need to add Grid tag to work properly in Android #19319
  • [Android] ScrollOrientation.Neither not disable scroll #19213
  • ScrollView within ScrollView, outer partly stops working after scrolling inner #19323
  • RadioButton TextColor not applying on MacOS and iOS in MAUI #19520
  • Add implicit operators between System.Drawing.Color and Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Color #19538
  • Restore is failing. Error - AndroidManifest.xml file doesn't exist in default MAUI project #19416
  • Request to add TabIndex, IsTabStop and Focusable #19539
  • MAUI RadioButton CheckedState color #19272
  • [regression/8.0.0] Border is not displayed when inside a Frame in .net 8 #19274
  • TranslationX/Y Changes Won't Be Applied to Bounds In AbsoluteLayout #19368
  • MAUI project, which adds a quill project as a control call. Packaging has been unsuccessful. I checked the Internet N times, and they all said that the .cspproject file should be removed #19399
  • In flexlayout, appear abnormal if AlignContent = "SpaceBetween" and Wrap = "Reverse". #19400
  • Child controls doesn't ignore safeArea even if you've disabled the safe area for the page in .Net 8 #19296
  • .NET Maui is showing 80 errors #19404

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable flaky compat test #19546
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-flakiness, testing-legacy-ui-tests

Merged

  • Set Simulator UDID explicitly for CG UI tests #19540
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [testing] Enable a way to test on real devices #19492
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19533
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix Flyout layout #19125
    area/shell 🐢
  • Clean up async assertions #19385
  • [Android] Fix RefreshView loading indicator position #17647
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    area/image :framed_picture:, do-not-merge, stale, Under Consideration
  • Makes KeyboardAutoManager.GoToNextResponderOrResign public #18667
    community ✨, stale
  • Removed vestigial UpdateContentLayout() method left over from Forms #18856
    area/layout 🔲, partner/android

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 8 fails generating optimized model when using `List<TEnum>` #32659
  • Ephemeral/Shadow navigation properties or other mechanism of automatic joins. #32658
  • Translatable columns #32657
  • Investigate benefits of using UnsafeAccessorAttribute in EF Core #32656
  • About call SqlQueryRaw #32654

Closed

  • What's the fluent API counterpart of ComplexTypeAttribute? #32655

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Created

  • Move VMR component list into `Components.md` #18023
